title: Strictly viewers can’t get over Karim Zeroual’s Salsa to Who Let The Dogs Out
text:
Karim wowed with his dance (Picture: BBC)

Karim Zeroual and Amy Dowden won over Strictly viewers after performing a Salsa to Baha Men’s Who Let The Dogs Out.

The CBBC presenter has garnered a reputation for some of the most fun dances this series, ranging from Kung Fu Panda-themed Samba’s and to a Tango to George Ezra’s Paradise.

Joining his growing roster was his latest dance in week five, a Salsa to Baha Men classic Who Let The Dogs Out released in 2000.

To mark the occasion, Karim was even joined by CBBC puppet Hacker T. Dog, who had the dance dedicated to him.

The dance earned widespread approval from the judges, with Motsi Mabuse, saying: ‘You gave me more than a party. Change the song to, “Who let Karim out”.

‘Quick changes, acrobatics, leading, what more do you want? You take this competition to a whole different level.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Shirley Ballas added: ‘You just set the bar even higher. There’s not a part of your body you can’t move is there?

Karim Zeroual and Hacker T Dog (Picture: BBC)

‘You’re just a delight to watch in every way.’

The dance earned Karim the scores, 8, 10, 9, 9, from the judges, achieving a total score of 36 points and placing joint second on the leaderboard behind Saffron Barker and AJ Pritchard.

Viewers were similarly barking mad for the performance.

Just give Karim & Amy that trophy now! #strictly pic.twitter.com/eZ1f6t4kCv — Luke Robinson (@mrlukerobinson) October 19, 2019

Karim is sooooo good, just hand him the glitter ball now #Strictly — Beth👻 (@bethmbarton) October 19, 2019

See you in the final Karim!! BLOODY HELL!! #Strictly — William (@William33678604) October 19, 2019

Strictly Come Dancing continues Sunday on BBC One.

MORE: Strictly Come Dancing’s Shirley Ballas was convinced breast implants would ‘save’ her marriage to ex-husband
description: Karim Zeroual performed a Salsa to Who Let The Dogs Out and floored everyone.
